price: Watapeana humo bilauri zisio na vinywaji vya kuleta maneno ya upuuzi wala dhambi.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ
footnotes: Huko Peponi watakuwa wakipeana kwa mapenzi bilauri zilio jaa vinywaji visio leta maneno yasiyo na maana wala vitendo vya dhambi, yaani havilevi na kuondoa akili.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
